search.query:
| tstats count where index="ssphp_metrics_data" by sourcetype
| fields sourcetype | join type=outer sourcetype [| search index="ssphp_metrics_data" earliest=-2d latest=now | stats count by sourcetype, SSPHP_RUN | eval SSPHP_RUN=strftime(SSPHP_RUN,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S"), run='SSPHP_RUN'." - ".'count' | stats values(run) as runs by sourcetype | eval runs=mvjoin(runs,"~~")] | eval runs=split(runs,"~~")

`ssphp_summary_index` earliest=-4h latest=now ssphp.use_case.id="m365*" ssphp.use_case.id!="*_000" | eval SSPHP_RUN=strftime(SSPHP_RUN,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")." - ".'ssphp.score.score' | stats values(SSPHP_RUN) as SSPHP_RUN by ssphp.use_case.id

`ssphp_summary_index` earliest=-4h latest=now ssphp.use_case.id="m365_*_000" | eval SSPHP_RUN=strftime(SSPHP_RUN,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S")." - ".'ssphp.score.score' | stats values(SSPHP_RUN) as SSPHP_RUN by ssphp.use_case.id
